name: Recoverability
definition: Represents the scope of resources needed to recover from the incident.

values.name: Regular
values.definition: Time to recovery is predictable with existing resources.

values.name: Supplemented
values.definition: Time to recover is predictable with additional resources.

values.name: Extended
values.definition: Time to recovery is unpredictable; additional resources and outside assistance may be required.

values.name: Not Recoverable
values.definition: Recovery from the incident is not possible.
